abstract: The big maker of consumer products cited slow growth in emerging markets, where it generates more than half its sales.
snippet: The big maker of consumer products cited slow growth in emerging markets, where it generates more than half its sales.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The global economy might be slowly recovering and consumers gradually gaining confidence. But Unilever, one of the world’s largest consumer products companies, remains cautious.

headline.main: Caution at Unilever as Its Sales Slow Down
headline.print_headline: Caution at Unilever as Its Sales Slow Down
